Key Match Events: Bowden Francis pitched a no-hitter through eight innings but gave up a leadoff home run in the ninth to Francisco Lindor
The Mets added five more runs off the Blue Jays bullpen in the ninth to win 6-2
Post-Match Reflections: Bowden Francis is ending the season on a historic run and positioning himself as a piece of the 2025 rotation
Francis showed he can be a reliable big-league starter for the Blue Jays this year and beyond
Miscellaneous Highlights: Francis had a career-high 12 strikeouts against the Angels but only one against the Mets
Despite the no-hitter bid, Francis received a standing ovation after eight fantastic one-run innings with a strikeout, a walk, and two hit batters
